main.bio: Military veteran with a love for everything tech. Im a huge fan of sports, enjoy outdoor activities, huge fitness enthusiast,  and enjoy learning new things. As a developer I aim to simplify complex feature sets for the end user.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details. Need to get coached? Reach out.

education.description: Web application focused, learning object oriented programming using Ruby, Rails, ES6 & React. During my time here, I completed 3 fully functional apps.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
